name: Early Morning Relaxation
description: Some people may watch short shows or play casual mobile games to start the day.

name: Late Morning Entertainment
description: Light entertainment—listening to podcasts, watching videos, or casual gaming during breaks.

name: Lunchtime Break Entertainment
description: Quick entertainment during lunch breaks—an episode of a show or mobile games.

name: Afternoon Escapism
description: Watching movies, gaming, or browsing streaming platforms during free afternoons.

name: Evening Prime Time Entertainment
description: Prime time for TV shows, movies, or gaming after work hours.

name: Late Evening Entertainment
description: Watching full-length movies, binge-watching series, or longer gaming sessions.

name: Late-Night Gaming or Streaming
description: Late-night movie marathons, streaming, or gaming sessions before bed.

name: Overnight Chill
description: Niche but growing segment for late-night gamers, binge-watchers, or streamers.
